nodes.text: Coruscant Security Force incident support vessel

The Coruscant Security Force incident support vessel was an airspeeder utilized by the Coruscant Security Force on the planet Coruscant during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. The support vessel would be activated with a pilot for crowd control and various other support actions at major police operations and incidents. In 21 BBY, a support vessel was present at the investigation of an explosion of Grand Army of the Republic Depot Bravo Five.
The Coruscant Security Force incident support vessel appeared in Republic Commando: Triple Zero, a novel by Karen Traviss that was published in 2006.
